thm lmod1lem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c3), c0), csn(c0)))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c3), c0), csn(c0))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c3), c0), csn(c0))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c3), c0), csn(c0))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  eqeltrd(co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c3), c0), csn(c0), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  ovmpt2d(s1, s2, cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c3), c0, c0, cfv(cbs, c2), csn(c0), cv(s2), csn(c0), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  eqcomd(cfv(cvsca, c3), cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cbs, c2), csn(c0), cv(s2)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2))), wceq(cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cbs, c2), csn(c0), cv(s2)), cfv(cvsca, c3)), wcel(cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cbs, c2), csn(c0), cv(s2)), universe))
  sylancr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cbs, c2), csn(c0), cv(s2)), universe), wcel(cfv(cbs, c2), universe), wcel(csn(c0), universe))
  fvex(cbs, c2)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(csn(c0), universe))
  snex(c0)
  mpt2exga(s1, s2, cfv(cbs, c2), universe, csn(c0), universe, cv(s2))
  lmodvsca(cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cbs, c2), csn(c0), cv(s2)), universe, c3, csn(c0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c2)
  simprr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s2), c0))
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(c0, csn(c0)))
  snidg(c0, c1)
  diff.w3a.s(s1, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2)))

  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.w3a.s(s2, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c2, crg)
  diff.crg.s(s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c2))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c2)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
  diff.csn.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cbs, c2)
  diff.cbs.s(s2)
  diff.csn.s(s2, c0)

  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà Ring ‚àß s0 ‚àà(Base ` c2)), (s1 ‚àà(Base ` c2), s2 ‚àà { c0 } ‚Ü¶ s2)=(√ó ` c3), (s1 ‚àà(Base ` c2), s2 ‚àà { c0 } ‚Ü¶ s2)‚àà ùïå)
  sylancr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà Ring ‚àß s0 ‚àà(Base ` c2)), (s1 ‚àà(Base ` c2), s2 ‚àà { c0 } ‚Ü¶ s2)‚àà ùïå, (Base ` c2)‚àà ùïå, { c0 } ‚àà ùïå)

  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà Ring), ((Base ` c2)‚àà ùïå ‚àß { c0 } ‚àà ùïå))

blocks.content: A and B are not equal. (Contributed by AV, 24-May-2019.) (Revised by AV, 10-Jun-2019.)

thm zlmodzxzldeplem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wne(c0, c1)
  -| wceq(c2, co(zring, cfrlm, cpr(nat0, nat1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(nat0, nat3), cop(nat1, nat6)))
  -| wceq(c1, cpr(cop(nat0, nat2), cop(nat1, nat4)))
} = {
  a1ii(wne(c0, c1), wceq(c2, co(zring, cfrlm, cpr(nat0, nat1))))
  mpbir(wne(c0, c1), wne(cpr(cop(nat0, nat3), cop(nat1, nat6)), cpr(cop(nat0, nat2), cop(nat1, nat4))))
  mp2(wne(cpr(cop(nat0, nat3), cop(nat1, nat6)), cpr(cop(nat0, nat2), cop(nat1, nat4))), wa(wa(wcel(cop(nat0, nat3), universe), wcel(cop(nat1, nat6), universe)), wa(wcel(cop(nat0, nat2), universe), wcel(cop(nat1, nat4), universe))), wo(wa(wne(cop(nat0, nat3), cop(nat0, nat2)), wne(cop(nat0, nat3), cop(nat1, nat4))), wa(wne(cop(nat1, nat6), cop(nat0, nat2)), wne(cop(nat1, nat6), cop(nat1, nat4)))))
  pm3.2i(wa(wcel(cop(nat0, nat3), universe), wcel(cop(nat1, nat6), universe)), wa(wcel(cop(nat0, nat2), universe), wcel(cop(nat1, nat4), universe)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(cop(nat0, nat3), universe), wcel(cop(nat1, nat6), universe))
  opex(nat0, nat3)
  opex(nat1, nat6)
  pm3.2i(wcel(cop(nat0, nat2), universe), wcel(cop(nat1, nat4), universe))
  opex(nat0, nat2)
  opex(nat1, nat4)
  orci(wa(wne(cop(nat0, nat3), cop(nat0, nat2)), wne(cop(nat0, nat3), cop(nat1, nat4))), wa(wne(cop(nat1, nat6), cop(nat0, nat2)), wne(cop(nat1, nat6), cop(nat1, nat4))))
  pm3.2i(wne(cop(nat0, nat3), cop(nat0, nat2)), wne(cop(nat0, nat3), cop(nat1, nat4)))
  mpbir(wne(cop(nat0, nat3), cop(nat0, nat2)), wo(wne(nat0, nat0), wne(nat3, nat2)))
  olci(wne(nat0, nat0), wne(nat3, nat2))
  gtneii(nat3, nat2)

  mp2an(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c1), wne(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), nat0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

  2ne0()
  neeq1d(cfv(c2, c0), nat0, nat2, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))

  fveq1i(c2, c0, cpr(cop(c0, nat2), cop(c1, cneg(nat3))))
  mp1i(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cfv(cpr(cop(c0, nat2), cop(c1, cneg(nat3))), c0), nat2), wne(c0, c1))

  ovex(zring, cfrlm, cpr(nat0, nat1))
  mp2an(wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cpw(cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c2)))

  ‚ä¢ { c0, c1 }[linDepS]c2
  ‚ä£ c2 =(ZZring[freeLMod]{ 0, 1 })
  ‚ä£ c0 = { < 0, 3 >, < 1, 6 > }
  ‚ä£ c1 = { < 0, 2 >, < 1, 4 > }
} = {
  mpbir({ c0, c1 }[linDepS]c2, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]{ c0, c1 }),(hs0[finSupp]0 ‚àß(hs0[(linC ` c2)]{ c0, c1 })=(0 ` c2)‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà { c0, c1 },(hs0 ` hs1)‚â† 0))))

  zlmodzxzldeplem1({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }, c0, c1, c2)
  3pm3.2i({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }[finSupp]0, ({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }[(linC ` c2)]{ c0, c1 })=(0 ` c2), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà { c0, c1 },({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> } ` hs1)‚â† 0))
  zlmodzxzldeplem2({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }, c2, c0, c1)
  zlmodzxzldeplem3({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }, c2, c0, c1)
  zlmodzxzldeplem4(hs1, c0, c1, { < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }, c2)
  eqid({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> })
  rspcev(hs0, { < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }, (‚Ñ§[‚Ü¶]{ c0, c1 }), ({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }[finSupp]0 ‚àß({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }[(linC ` c2)]{ c0, c1 })=(0 ` c2)‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà { c0, c1 },({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> } ` hs1)‚â† 0)), (hs0[finSupp]0 ‚àß(hs0[(linC ` c2)]{ c0, c1 })=(0 ` c2)‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà { c0, c1 },(hs0 ` hs1)‚â† 0)))
  3anbi123d(hs0 = { < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }, hs0[finSupp]0, (hs0[(linC ` c2)]{ c0, c1 })=(0 ` c2), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà { c0, c1 },(hs0 ` hs1)‚â† 0), { < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }[finSupp]0, ({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }[(linC ` c2)]{ c0, c1 })=(0 ` c2), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà { c0, c1 },({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> } ` hs1)‚â† 0))
  breq1(hs0, { < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }, cfsupp, nat0)
  eqeq1d((hs0[(linC ` c2)]{ c0, c1 }), (0 ` c2), ({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }[(linC ` c2)]{ c0, c1 }), hs0 = { < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> })
  oveq1(hs0, { < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }, (linC ` c2), { c0, c1 })
  rexbidv(hs1, { c0, c1 }, hs0 = { < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> }, (hs0 ` hs1)‚â† 0, ({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> } ` hs1)‚â† 0)
  neeq1d((hs0 ` hs1), nat0, ({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> } ` hs1), hs0 = { < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> })

  eqid((Base ` c2))
  eqid((0 ` c2))
  simpri(ZZring =(Scalar ` c2), c2 ‚àà LMod)
  zlmodzxzlmod(c2)
  zringbas()
  zring0()
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)

  diff.hs0.c({ < c0, 2 >, < c1, -u(3)> })
